TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnouncementService extends System.Object

summary.span: 公告服务的自承载实现。

span.span: A self-hosted implementation of the announcement service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类侦听标准公告终结点 () 上的传入消息，并在 Hello 或 Bye 公告消息到达时提供事件通知。This class listens for incoming messages on a standard announcement endpoint () and provides event notification when Hello or Bye announcement messages arrive. 通过从此类派生，可以提供自定义公告服务实现。You can provide a custom announcement service implementation by deriving from this class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: duplicateMessageHistoryLength
param.span: 传输用来标识重复消息的消息哈希的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of message hashes used by the transport for identifying duplicate messages.
The default value is 0.

summary.span: 接收脱机公告 (Bye) 消息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an offline announcement (Bye) message is received,

param.name: messageSequence
param.span: 此消息在当前通知序列中的位置。

span.span: The position of this message in the sequence for the current notification.

param.name: endpointDiscoveryMetadata
param.span: 一个对象，该对象提供终结点元数据，例如，范围、侦听 URI、协定名称和终结点地址。

span.span: An object that provides endpoint metadata, for example scopes, listen URI, contract names, and endpoint address.

param.name: callback
param.span: 将在完成异步操作时调用的方法。

span.span: The method to call when the asynchronous operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 基础结构定义的状态数据。

span.span: Infrastructure-defined state data.

summary.span: 开始处理传入的脱机公告 (Bye) 消息。

span.span: Starts the processing of incoming offline announcement (Bye) messages.

returns.span: 挂起的异步请求的状态。

span.span: The status of the pending asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 中继承以实现自定义公告侦听器服务的类必须重写此方法，并开始处理传入的 Bye 消息。Classes that inherit from to implement a custom announcement listener service must override this method and begin to process incoming Bye messages.

summary.span: 开始处理传入的联机公告 (Hello) 消息。

span.span: Starts the processing of incoming online announcement (Hello) messages.

returns.span: 挂起的异步请求的状态。

span.span: The status of the pending asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 中继承以实现自定义公告侦听器服务的类必须重写此方法，并开始处理传入的 Hello 消息。Classes that inherit from to implement a custom announcement listener service must override this method and begin to process incoming Hello messages.
